::Kluster::

Kluster frowns at Phobia. "Its not that simple. If the Militrons have 
contacted anyone, or made any treaties, leaving the base would be suicidal 
for us. A stealth mission is easier. Perhaps take out their engines, and then 
continue to their weapon systems..."
